OCD.name: Horizontal Line Graph
OCD.description: Takes tabular data and generates PostScript for a horizontal line graph.

AD.name: Label
AD.description: The field used to label the bar lines

AD.name: Start Date
AD.description: The field used for the starting date

AD.name: End Date
AD.description: The field used for the ending date

AD.name: Size By
AD.description: The field used to size the horizontal bar lines by

AD.name: Date Format
AD.description: The format of the start and end dates

AD.name: Page Width
AD.description: The width of the page the output PostScript should be scaled to

AD.name: Page Height
AD.description: The height of the page the output PostScript should be scaled to

AD.name: Scale Output?
AD.description: The format of the start and end dates
